title: Galaxy Minstrels, yummy
content:
I think this is a font as the text on the rest of the packet is the same. I like the soft and curly look ... do any of you know similar fonts, or what this one is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201165437im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/minstrels_6502.jpg)
  
Thanks :)
 [‹ Old VGC Poster](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201165437/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48961 "Go to previous forum topic") [Any idea of this font? WhatTheFont couldn't find it. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201165437/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49013 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Bendy

comments.content: The closest I can get is [FF Strada Bold Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201165437/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_strada_ot_bold_italic/), but that’s still not right.
I think Cronos Swash (Adobe) is a bit closer...

Slimbach does do lovely fonts! This Cronos Italic is very restful. But, no curly toes on the lowercase n and i. The t is extremely close I think.  
Perhaps could it be customised?
